headline20: Critical operational constraints are flagged at 17 airports right now.
management45: Critical operational constraints are flagged at 17 airports right now. No engine anti-ice operations are currently flagged. Across base airports: 8 critical, 14 high, 8 medium, 9 normal. Key bases needing attention include London Luton (LTN/EGGW), London Gatwick (LGW/EGKK) and Copernicus Wrocław (WRO/EPWR); plus 19 other bases. 8 additional base airports are at medium severity and should be monitored closely. At base airports, the dominant pattern is snow-related runway contamination risk, mist and low cloud base  — most notably around Copernicus Wrocław (WRO/EPWR), Chişinău (RMO/LUKK) and Katowice Wojciech Korfanty (KTW/EPKT). Network hotspots: Berlin Brandenburg Willy Brandt (BER/EDDB), Lennart Meri Tallinn (TLL/EETN), Billund (BLL/EKBI), Gdańsk Lech Wałęsa (GDN/EPGD), Kraków John Paul II (KRK/EPKK) and 12 others. Primary drivers: low cloud base, mist and snow / blowing snow. Expected impact is reduced runway capacity with higher delay and diversion risk, especially where visibility/RVR and cloud base are very low. Since the last update, 12 airports changed status, led by Tuzla (TZL/LQTZ), Bacău George Enescu (BCM/LRBC), Ljubljana Jože Pučnik (LJU/LJLJ) and 9 others.
detail90: Critical operational constraints are flagged at 17 airports right now. Base airports (focus): London Luton (LTN/EGGW) — HIGH: fog; visibility down to 200 m, cloud base around 100 ft | London Gatwick (LGW/EGKK) — HIGH: fog; visibility down to 700 m, cloud base around 100 ft | Copernicus Wrocław (WRO/EPWR) — CRIT: fog; snow; visibility down to 100 m, cloud base around 100 ft | Chişinău (RMO/LUKK) — CRIT: mist; snow; runway contamination risk | Timişoara Traian Vuia (TSR/LRTR) — HIGH: fog; visibility down to 300 m, cloud base around 100 ft | Katowice Wojciech Korfanty (KTW/EPKT) — CRIT: fog; snow; visibility down to 350 m, cloud base around 100 ft and 16 others. Worst affected now: Berlin Brandenburg Willy Brandt (BER/EDDB) — CRIT: freezing fog; snow; visibility down to 300 m, cloud base around 100 ft (drivers: low-visibility procedures (reduced capacity), runway visual range (RVR) constraints, very low visibility) | Lennart Meri Tallinn (TLL/EETN) — CRIT: mist; snow; cold-temperature performance penalties (drivers: cold-temperature performance penalties, low ceilings, mist) | Billund (BLL/EKBI) — CRIT: mist; snow; cold-temperature performance penalties (drivers: cold-temperature performance penalties, low ceilings, mist) | Gdańsk Lech Wałęsa (GDN/EPGD) — CRIT: mist; snow; cold-temperature performance penalties (drivers: cold-temperature performance penalties, low ceilings, mist) | Kraków John Paul II (KRK/EPKK) — CRIT: fog; snow; visibility down to 700 m, cloud base around 200 ft (drivers: runway visual range (RVR) constraints, approach minima limits, very low visibility) | Katowice Wojciech Korfanty (KTW/EPKT) — CRIT: fog; snow; visibility down to 350 m, cloud base around 100 ft (drivers: low-visibility takeoff restrictions, runway visual range (RVR) constraints, approach minima limits) and 11 others. Changed since last run: Tuzla (TZL/LQTZ), Bacău George Enescu (BCM/LRBC), Ljubljana Jože Pučnik (LJU/LJLJ), Suceava Stefan cel Mare (SCV/LRSV), Timişoara Traian Vuia (TSR/LRTR), Belgrade Nikola Tesla (BEG/LYBE), Brașov-Ghimbav (GHV/LRBV), Bucharest Henri Coandă (OTP/LROP), Adolfo Suárez Madrid–Barajas (MAD/LEMD), Lisbon Humberto Delgado (LIS/LPPT) and 2 others.
